Hextris is a fast‑paced puzzle game inspired by Tetris but played on a hexagon. Colored blocks fall from the edges toward the center, and you rotate the hexagon to catch them. Match three or more of the same color to clear them before they stack up and reach the outer limit.

Moment to moment you’re spinning the board left and right, trying to manage incoming blocks from all six sides. The speed increases as you play, forcing you to think faster and prioritize which side needs attention. It’s a hypnotic test of reflexes and pattern recognition that’s hard to put down once you find your rhythm.

Terris is a fast-paced, modern tribute to the world’s most famous block-stacking puzzle game. The goal is simple yet infinitely challenging: arrange falling geometric shapes (Tetriminos) to create solid horizontal lines. Once a line is completed, it vanishes, earning you points and preventing the screen from filling up. As your score increases, the speed of the falling blocks intensifies, requiring lightning-fast reflexes and spatial awareness. This version features clean, minimalist graphics and smooth animations, making it an excellent choice for both casual play and high-score chasing. Whether you're a veteran player looking to practice your 'T-spin' techniques or a newcomer, Terris delivers a timeless arcade experience.
